item.title: Kristy add a quote by Simon R. Green
item.description: "There has been peace. There will be peace again. But right now, we have work to do." -- Simon R. Green

item.title: Kristy add a quote by Josh Gates
item.description: "Travel does not exist without home....If we never return to the place we started, we would just be wandering, lost. Home is a reflecting surface, a place to measure our growth and enrich us after being infused with the outside world." -- Josh Gates

item.title: Kristy add a quote by Ursula K. Le Guin
item.description: "What good is power when you're too wise to use it?" -- Ursula K. Le Guin

item.title: Kristy add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Kristy add a quote by Simon R. Green
item.description: "Too many people live the lives other people think they ought to, following orders they don't agree with, for causes they don't believe in. They live lives that don't matter, that touch no one and change nothing. For better or worse, you and I stared evil in the eye and didn't flinch. We raised our swords and went to war, and even if we didn't win we kicked some ass along the way. We made a difference, and that's all any man can ask." -- Simon R. Green

item.title: Kristy add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "You will never be able to escape from your heart. So it's better to listen to what it has to say. That way, you'll never have to fear an unanticipated blow." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Kristy add a quote by Katharine Hepburn
item.description: "If you always do what interests you, at least one person is pleased." -- Katharine Hepburn

item.title: Kristy add a quote by Shirley Jackson
item.description: "No live organism can continue for long to exist sanely under conditions of absolute reality." -- Shirley Jackson

item.title: Kristy add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "My concern is not whether God is on our side; my greatest concern is to be on God's side, for God is always right." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Kristy add a quote by Donna Tartt
item.description: "Even if it meant that she had failed, she was glad. And if what she'd wanted had been impossible from the start, still there was a certain lonely comfort in the fact that she'd known it was impossible and had gone ahead and done it anyway." -- Donna Tartt

item.title: Kristy add a quote by Bette Midler
item.description: "Give a girl the right shoes, and she can conquer the world." -- Bette Midler

item.title: Kristy add a quote by William Knowlton Zinsser
item.description: "Decide what you want to do. Then decide to do it. Then do it." -- William Knowlton Zinsser

item.title: Kristy add a quote by John Steinbeck
item.description: "For it is said that humans are never satisfied, that you give them one thing and they want something more. And this is said in disparagement, whereas it is one of the greatest talents the species has and one that has made it superior to animals that are satisfied with what they have." -- John Steinbeck

item.title: Kristy add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "Home is the place where, when you have to go there, They have to take you in." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Kristy add a quote by Patrick Henry Hughes
item.description: "At the end of the day, can you look back and say to yourself, "Today, my mother would be proud of me because I gave it all I had"? If you can, you will have had a very good day. And if you can do this every day, you will have a very good life." -- Patrick Henry Hughes
